Definition.WordDefinition: Hershey, NE (village, FIPS 22290) Location: 41.15812 N, 101.00129 W Population (1990): 579 (258 housing units) Area: 1.3 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 69143 Hershey, PA (CDP, FIPS 34144) Location: 40.28008 N, 76.64770 W Population (1990): 11860 (5490 housing units) Area: 37.9 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 17033

Hershey n 1: United States confectioner and philanthropist who created the model industrial town of Hershey, Pennsylvania; founded an industrial school for orphan boys (1857-1945) [syn: {Milton Snavely Hershey}] 2: an industrial town east of Harrisburg
